BackOffice.instructionOne: Check basic info of stocks, if the input below is empty, it will search for all stocks
BackOffice.instructionTwo: Click Create Stock to create a new stock info
BackOffice.instructionThree: Edit or delete a specific stock in the table
BackOffice.stockAlreadyExist: This stock is existed already, please check again.
BackOffice.createHint: Fields below are required. Proceed to create a stock.
BackOffice.editHint: Fields below are required. Proceed to edit a stock.
BackOffice.searchPlaceholder: Enter stock symbol or leave blank to search for all stock
BackOffice.noData: No Data, please adjust your searching conditoin
